name: Necro-Tactics
description:
A rogue-like tactics game inspired by Into the Breach. Enemies telegraph their targets and attacks before combat, and can be recruited into your undead army once defeated. Mouse over enemies to view health and see the target of their attack. Currently an early prototype, development currently on hold.

Defeated enemies also drop souls which are used to upgrade your units. In the unit collection, drag a unit into the top-right to add them to your current roster. Damage is not healed between fights so try to keep your units alive.

Controls:

Q - Ability

E - End turn

A - Move

Bugs:

  • UI not properly scaled outside of fullscreen
